about_the_game:
The continent of Unornia was thrown into chaos as the rulers of four different kingdoms - Fleuretta, Winterbrand, Verdandia and Goldensong, all died in mysterious circumstances on the same day. As heirs were suddenly thrust into their new roles following their succession, accusations towards each other were flung, beginning a period of turmoil after centuries of peace.

Here steps in Mia, a time-travelling advisor interested in nothing more than the land's peace. Befriending one of the kingdom's rulers (with steps rehearsed from multiple timelines of attempts), she becomes their strategist who is tasked to lead the troops to victory.

Many times she witnessed the rise of Kingdoms.

Many times she witnessed their fall, when she decided that enough is enough, and we return back to a time she must choose again whom to fight alongside with.

With the realization that today's friend is an enemy in another timeline, she must suppress her emotions as she relives moments of conflict and bloodshed with people she fought with and against, again and again...

To Mia, no sacrifice is too great, as she makes it her mission to find out what truly transpired on that fateful day, and to prevent this content she loves from spiraling to its calamity.

Game Features:

  • Choose between one of four Kingdoms to support. The lush flowery plains of Fleuretta, the cold mountains of Winterbrand, the verdant forests of Verdandia and the harsh wastelands of Goldensong. Each of them come with their own sets of heroes and units, offering unique play styles!

  • Further customize your heroes and units with more than 50 skills

  • Build up your Kingdom's Capital so that you can recruit stronger and varied troops

  • Bond with your fellow retainers, with some conversations only possible using knowledge gained in another timeline

  • Make decisions that will inevitably shape up the future that Mia desires, or perhaps providing the opposite effect

  • Utilize your knowledge of future and use "Gambits" to completely alter the course of battles!

short_description: Become a time-travelling advisor seeking to shape this world towards her ideal future. Choose between one of four kingdoms to support, with the realization that today's friend is an enemy in another timeline. Bring out your best Gambits and lead your troops to victory!
